page.description: Defines the field validation behavior for the repeating section.
page.discussion: Specify if fields in all repeating section rows should be validated or if only fields in the repeating section that are dirty should be validated.

item.name: AllFieldsInRow
item.description: If this option is selected, validation will be applied to all fields in a repeating section row.

item.name: DirtyFieldsInRow
item.description: If this option is selected, validation will only be applied to dirty fields in a repeating section row.
